summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Newton Street from 26th Avenue West to 28th Avenue West; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9610 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
